welcome.title: Welcome to Electron App
welcome.description: A powerful, secure, and modern template for your next project.

security.title: Secure by Default
security.description: Built with context isolation, sandbox enabled, and strict CSP.

features.title: Feature Rich
features.description: Includes Tabs, Command Palette, i18n, and more out of the box.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Boost your productivity with built-in shortcuts ({{mod}}+K) and command palette ({{mod}}+Shift+P).
